about_the_game:
Please make sure to experience this 3D third person roguelike game with strategic depth!
You are a powerful adventurer who has come to the legendary land of no return - the Valley of Twilight. With your own strength, you conquer countless monsters and fight to the death against the powerful lord!

Game features

--Select up to 7 soul stones with different mechanisms for automatic attacks from the wave rewards to assist in battles, such as combo attacks, automatic energy accumulation, health recovery, shield generation, and poison element area generation.
--Select up to 5 magic arrays from the wave rewards, divided into attack type magic arrays and effect type magic arrays. Hold down the skill to cast each magic array in a customized order, with slightly different orders resulting in vastly different results!
--Choose a one-time summoning magic from the wave rewards, which can summon summoning objects to assist in battles and will definitely help you overcome difficulties!
--Attacks may also involve element types, where elements such as ice, fire, water, darkness, and poison will hit the corresponding element area of the enemy, and the player or enemy will enter the corresponding abnormal state after passing through the area,
Using elemental physics, light, electricity, and wind can deal higher damage and additional effects on monsters in abnormal states with corresponding restraint!
--The gameplay and difficulty vary among different waves, and there may even be merchants who provide trading and enhanced services!
